subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Steve Wilstein, the reporter who doused the Mark McGwire-Sammy Sosa celebration in 1998 by questioning its legitimacy, has a chance to be voted into the Hall of Fame before either of the sluggers.
snippet: Steve Wilstein, the reporter who doused the Mark McGwire-Sammy Sosa celebration in 1998 by questioning its legitimacy, has a chance to be voted into the Hall of Fame before either of the sluggers.
